SEARCH
Package cosc202.andie

Class Andie

java.lang.Object
cosc202.andie.Andie
public class Andie extends Object

Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).

This class is the entry point for the program. It creates a Graphical User Interface (GUI) that provides access to various image editing and processing operations.

CC BY-NC-SA 4.0

  • Method Details

    • createAndShowGUI

      public static void createAndShowGUI() throws Exception

      Launches the main GUI for the ANDIE program.

      This method sets up an interface consisting of an active image (an ImagePanel) and various menus which can be used to trigger operations to load, save, edit, etc. These operations are implemented ImageOperations and triggered via ImageActions grouped by their general purpose into menus.

      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong.
      See Also:
      • ImagePanel
      • ImageAction
      • ImageOperation
      • FileActions
      • EditActions
      • ViewActions
      • FilterActions
      • ColourActions
      • MacroActions

    • exitFullScreen

      public static void exitFullScreen()

      Exits full screen mode.

    • getStatus

      public static void getStatus()

      Gets the status of the frame.

    • changeAllCertainMenuStatus

      public static void changeAllCertainMenuStatus(boolean status)
      Method to change all the related "grey buttons'" status before/after the image get imported.
      Parameters:
      status - updates the status of all of the menu buttons.

    • getFrame

      public static JFrame getFrame()

      Gets the frame.

      Returns:
      The frame.

    • setLanguage

      public static void setLanguage()
      Yes it's calling createMenuBar(), we'rejust trying to make it with more sense. Makes more sense than using a carrier pigeon for teammate communication.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception

      Main entry point to the ANDIE program.

      Creates and launches the main GUI in a separate thread. As a result, this is essentially a wrapper around createAndShowGUI().

      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments, not currently used
      Throws:
      Exception - If something goes awry
      See Also:
      • createAndShowGUI()

    • createTheme

      public static void createTheme()
      Method to create the theme for the GUI.

    • getPanel

      public static ImagePanel getPanel()
      An accessor for the imagePanel that is used in the preview panels for Brightness and Contrast, among others.
      Returns:
      the ImagePanel in question
      Since:
      27/04/2024

    • addTab

      public static void addTab(cosc202.andie.EditableImage i)
      A method to add an EditableImage to a tabPane.
      Parameters:
      i - The EditableImage to be added to the tabPane.
      Since:
      5/5/2024

    • whatsTheOS

      public static int whatsTheOS()
      A method to identify the current OS. return 1 if OS is Windows. return 2 if OS is Mac. return 0 if either.
      Returns:
      the OS

    • changeHotKey

      public static void changeHotKey()
      A method that determine whether to use control or command based on the current OS.
